title.value: Динамика растительного покрова нарушенных болотных экосистем под влиянием вторичного заболачивания (на примере болота 'Докудовское')
Dynamics of the plant cover of disturbed wetland ecosystems under the effect of the second  logging up based on the example of swamp 'Dokudovskoye'

journal.title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus. Biological Series

person.name: Zhylinski, D.Yu., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). The V.F. Kuprevich Institute of Experimental Botany

abstract.value: The paper presents the data of the initial stages of studies of structural and functional organization of anthropogenic disturbed wetland ecosystems on the example of 'Dokudovskoe' swamp and assesses the dynamics of vegetation under the influence of the secondary water logging. Tools to assess the status and dynamics of ecosystems used vegetation as the most objective parameter ecosystem functioning. Shows a relatively high degree of stability of wetland ecosystems to anthropogenic pressures and their consequences, as well as noting a relatively high potential for recovery, defined biological properties of the formation of wetland ecosystems.
